todos.name: Edit Functionality
todos.description: Add functionality to edit an entry by its ID.

todos.name: Unmark All
todos.description: Add functionality to unmark all tasks, useful for daily tasks.

todos.name: Grouped Display
todos.description: Implement a 'show' command that groups marked and unmarked tasks.

todos.name: Swap Order
todos.description: Implement a command to swap the order of tasks using their indices.

todos.name: More Properties
todos.description: Add new properties to each task entry, such as links or special variables.

todos.name: Task Types
todos.description: Differentiate tasks and group them by type.

todos.name: Add Steps
todos.description: Divide tasks into atomic steps to better describe the process to be done.

todos.name: Clear on Show
todos.description: Clear the terminal after executing the 'show' command for better task visualization.

todos.name: Clear + Show on Mark
todos.description: When marking a task, clear the terminal and show the updated task list, allowing for a better flow of changes.

todos.name: Remove Command Print
todos.description: Remove the printing of command arguments to make it cleaner.

todos.name: Create Installer
todos.description: Explore how to create an installer for this command-line tool to share it with others.

todos.name: Create Updater
todos.description: Create an 'update' command that updates to the latest version of CLIManager from the current repository.

todos.name: Handle Indices Carefully
todos.description: Handle IndexOutOfBounds errors in functions that receive user-provided indices.

todos.name: Separate Structs
todos.description: Place each struct and its respective implementations in different files for better code organization.

todos.name: Clear Command
todos.description: Create the 'clear' command that removes all todos from the list.

todos.name: Update Help Command
todos.description: Make 'help' a general description and use 'help command' for more detailed information about a specific command, like 'edit' and 'clear'.

todos.name: Add Percentage to Show
todos.description: Add a fraction (e.g., 7/10) and percentage value (e.g., 70%) of completed and incomplete tasks with -m and -u.

todos.name: Daltonic Mode
todos.description: Add a daltonic mode for those who have trouble distinguishing red from green.

todos.name: Deadlines
todos.description: Add tasks with completion deadlines.

todos.name: teste
todos.description: teste
